languages.text: "Войгтвир не оставит в покое ни семью Версериан, ни династию фон Валанциус, пока не будет мертв. Сосредоточьтесь на его поисках и уничтожении — это лучшее, что можно сделать сейчас".
"Voigtvir will not leave the Werserian family or the von Valancius dynasty in peace until he is dead. Focus on finding and destroying him — that is the best thing to do now."
languages.original_text: "Войгтвир не оставит в покое ни семью Версериан, ни династию фон Валанциус, пока не будет мертв. Сосредоточьтесь на его поисках и уничтожении — это лучшее, что можно сделать сейчас".

languages.text: “维特威尔绝不会放过韦尔森家族与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，除非他死了。眼下最好的选择，就是集中精力找到他， 杀了他。”
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir will not leave the Werserian family or the von Valancius dynasty in peace until he is dead. Focus on finding and destroying him — that is the best thing to do now."

traits.locale_text: “维特威尔绝不会放过韦尔森家族与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，除非他死了。眼下最好的选择，就是集中精力找到他， 杀了他。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Voigtvir ne laissera pas la famille Werserian ou la dynastie von Valancius en paix tant qu'il sera en vie. La meilleure chose à faire, c'est de le retrouver et de l'anéantir dans les plus brefs délais. »
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir will not leave the Werserian family or the von Valancius dynasty in peace until he is dead. Focus on finding and destroying him — that is the best thing to do now."

traits.locale_text: « Voigtvir ne laissera pas la famille Werserian ou la dynastie von Valancius en paix tant qu'il sera en vie. La meilleure chose à faire, c'est de le retrouver et de l'anéantir dans les plus brefs délais. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Voigtvir no dejará en paz ni a la familia Weserian ni a la dinastía von Valancius mientras viva. Debemos centrarnos en encontrarlo y acabar con él. Es nuestra mejor opción».
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir will not leave the Werserian family or the von Valancius dynasty in peace until he is dead. Focus on finding and destroying him — that is the best thing to do now."

traits.locale_text: «Voigtvir no dejará en paz ni a la familia Weserian ni a la dinastía von Valancius mientras viva. Debemos centrarnos en encontrarlo y acabar con él. Es nuestra mejor opción».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ボイドヴィルは己が死ぬまでウェルザリアン家とフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝をおびやかすだろう。奴を見つけ、滅ぼすことに集中しよう…それが今ある最善策だ」
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir will not leave the Werserian family or the von Valancius dynasty in peace until he is dead. Focus on finding and destroying him — that is the best thing to do now."

traits.locale_text: 「ボイドヴィルは己が死ぬまでウェルザリアン家とフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝をおびやかすだろう。奴を見つけ、滅ぼすことに集中しよう…それが今ある最善策だ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Voigtvir wird die Familie Werserian und die Dynastie von Valancius erst in Frieden lassen, wenn er tot ist. Konzentriert Euch darauf, ihn zu finden und zu zerstören — das ist im Moment das Beste, was Ihr tun könnt."
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir will not leave the Werserian family or the von Valancius dynasty in peace until he is dead. Focus on finding and destroying him — that is the best thing to do now."

traits.locale_text: "Voigtvir wird die Familie Werserian und die Dynastie von Valancius erst in Frieden lassen, wenn er tot ist. Konzentriert Euch darauf, ihn zu finden und zu zerstören — das ist im Moment das Beste, was Ihr tun könnt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Voigtvir will not leave the Werserian family or the von Valancius dynasty in peace until he is dead. Focus on finding and destroying him — that is the best thing to do now."

languages.text: "Voigtvir, Werserian ailesini de von Valancius hanedanlığını da ölene kadar rahat bırakmayacak. Onu bulup öldürmeye odaklanmalı. Yapılabilecek en iyi şey bu."
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir will not leave the Werserian family or the von Valancius dynasty in peace until he is dead. Focus on finding and destroying him — that is the best thing to do now."

traits.locale_text: "Voigtvir, Werserian ailesini de von Valancius hanedanlığını da ölene kadar rahat bırakmayacak. Onu bulup öldürmeye odaklan. Yapılabilecek en iyi şey bu."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
